name: Silver Ring
description: A silver ring you found in the sewers

name: Barrel of Gunpowder
description: A big barrel of gunpowder you found on the beach

name: Handmade Flag
description: A jolly roger you made yourself

name: Help Wanted Poster
description: You put up a help wanted poster and gather a few extra crew members

name: Treasure Map
description: A map to a lost treasure that you collected before setting sail

name: Call in some Favors
description: You call in some favors and gather some extra food and gunpowder

name: Barrel of Rum
description: A large barrel filled with rum

name: Bribe Prison Guards
description: You bribe a prison guard and break some pirates out of jail
